definition: edible rhizome of cattail 香蒲[xiang1 pu2]
refers to various monocotyledonous flowering plants including Acorus calamus and Typha orientalis/common cattail/bullrush
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: Pucai can not cook soup a long time to keep fresh features.
sentences.chinese: 蒲菜不能在汤中久煮，以保持鲜嫩特点。

definition: Manchurian wild rice 菰[gu1], aka water bamboo, or its edible stem, which resembles a bamboo shoot
Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
oriental whitebait/slender silvery-white fish e.g. Galaxias maculatus and Salangichthys microdon
winter bamboo shoots (smaller and tenderer as a result of being dug out before they come out of the soil)
Chinese toon (Toona sinensis), deciduous tree whose young leaves are used as a vegetable
asparagus/(Tw) young shoots of the chayote vine 佛手瓜[fo2 shou3 gua1]
